game.name: Desk. Target Quacking
game.shortDescription: Plant, grow and harvest vegetables on your own taskbar farm while gaming, working or doing whatever you're doing at the moment. No need to think big or manage complicated processes, just some relaxing idle farming.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Plant, grow and harvest vegetables on your own taskbar farm while gaming, working or doing whatever you're doing at the moment. No need to think big or manage complicated processes, just some relaxing idle farming.
